title: Achievement in Hong Kong
brief_description: The life of the Chinese population of Hong Kong and the emergency housing scheme. The history of the colony; the Chinese tradition; the disastrous fire of Christmas 1953 and the subsequent establishment of the Government Resettlement Department. Progress on the rehousing scheme, building large concrete blocks of emergency dwellings, to be converted into permanent flats as conditions improve. Cinematographer: Julius Evans
